name: Just Another Helix Game
description:
This is a Game I made for Game Design II. The project was to make a "Hyper Casual Game." What more of a perfect idea than making a Helix game.

-----------------------------------Mouse/ Touch Controls------------------------------------

click and hold the screen and move left and right to move the Helix. Avoid the Red Spots or the level restarts. if you pass 3 gates you get a boost  which can break a gate.

Esc - Pause the game.
